doc:
Tony Amendola https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Amendola 0 Tony Amendola (born August 24, 1951) is an American actor who is best known for playing the Jaffa master Bra'tac in Stargate SG-1. Amendola is also known for his recurring role as revolutionary leader Edouard Kagame of Liber8 in the television show Continuum. Since 2011, he has recurred on ABC's Once Upon a Time as Pinocchio's creator/father, Geppetto. Tony_Amendola ( born August_24 , 1951 ) is an_American_actor who is_best_known for playing the_Jaffa_master_Bra_'_tac in Stargate_SG-1 . Amendola is_also_known for his_recurring_role as revolutionary_leader_Edouard_Kagame of Liber8 in the_television_show_Continuum . Since 2011 , he has_recurred on ABC 's Once Upon a_Time as Pinocchio 's_creator/father , Geppetto .
